title: Cosmic Queries: Exploration
description: In this Cosmic Queries episode, Neil deGrasse Tyson answers fan questions about exploration, from the depths of the ocean to the outer reaches of the galaxy and even to other dimensions.
author: feed@startalkradio.net (Neil deGrasse Tyson)
